**Data Source:** [Living Standards Measurement Survey, Cambodia - Completed by the World Bank in 2020](https://microdata.worldbank.org/index.php/catalog/4045/get-microdata/)

```{r}
spi <- read.csv("data/spi.csv")
library(tidyverse)

spi <- spi %>%
  select(country, iso3c, date, SPI.INDEX.PIL1, SPI.INDEX.PIL2, SPI.INDEX.PIL3,
         SPI.INDEX.PIL4, SPI.INDEX.PIL5, SPI.INDEX,
         income, region, population)
  

```
